mapper.insert: insert into teacher (tid, pw, name) values (#{tid}, #{pw}, #{name})
mapper.update: update question set qInfo=#{qInfo}, ex1=#{ex1}, ex2=#{ex2}, ex3=#{ex3},ex4=#{ex4}, qPoint=#{qPoint}, answer=#{answer} where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName} and qNumber=#{qNumber}
mapper.select: select examName, qNumber, qInfo, ex1, ex2, ex3, ex4, qPoint, answer from question where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName} order by qNumber
mapper.delete: delete from question where subjectCode=#{subjectCode} and examName=#{examName}
